title: Stream tournament tonight!

embed.description: OCE]-HD- Plat 5 mid laner rankgrind #For the HORDE

body:
Come check us out, Tournament starts at 4pm QLD time :) 

Also there are numerous RP Giveaways to be done!

Click the link above the stream picture to be redirected to the stream, where you can have the chance to enter the tournament!

Hope to see you all there

replies.body: Also, There is a $25 RP card for the winner of the 1v1 tournament :D
